step_feedback.feedback: Rep 1 was very accurate. Rep 2 showed some deviation, especially in the elbows and wrists. Try to keep your arms straighter and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Rep 1 was good. Rep 2 had more variation in the elbows and wrists. Focus on maintaining a consistent arm position throughout the movement.
Rep 1 was good. Rep 2 had significant deviation in the wrists and elbows. Ensure you are making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together firmly, keeping arms relatively straight.
Both reps were quite accurate. Keep up the good work maintaining arm and shoulder blade position.
Rep 1 was good. Rep 2 showed considerable deviation in the elbows and wrists. Focus on controlled movement and maintaining form, especially when relaxing and stretching arms overhead.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! For the next session, focus on keeping your arms straighter and squeezing your shoulder blades together more firmly during the push down. This will help improve your form.
